vulnerability_findings.name: arbitrary-send
vulnerability_findings.message:
Lotto.cash (patch_14.sol#74-96) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- winner.transfer(subpot) (patch_14.sol#94)

vulnerability_findings.name: deprecated-standards
vulnerability_findings.message:
Deprecated standard detected @ patch_14.sol#40:
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"
